name: Help Me I'm Trapped in a Hospital
name_original: Help Me I'm Trapped in a Hospital
description:
After waking up in a hospital, you realize something is very wrong: all the doctors, patients, and their families have been zombified. Your only hope for survival is to escape the hospital. With only flashlight and gun in hand, will you be able to make it out alive?

Credits:
Created with GameMaker:Studio 1.4
Sound Effects from Youtube Audio Library
Music by Incompetech
Created by Chase Hyma and Lucas Rosetti

Created during the Spring 2018 Gamemaker Work Ready Class
